title: Web & Mobile App Development
description: As a web design company, we work hand in hand with you, from a consultation phase wherein we have a discovery call to understand your expectations, the scope of the project and then set a strategy together. We collaborate on the User Experience (UX) and User Interface (UI), color palettes, development and designs all the way through to going LIVE! At the end of the project, we then provide best practice training along with Hosting and Maintenance.

title: UI/UX Design & Prototyping
description: A great website is easy to navigate. Itâ€™s visually pleasing but not distracting. The design reflects your story, brand and reinforces your message. The design and copy harmonize to tell a clear story, directing the viewer where you want their eyes to go.

title: Cybersecurity & Data Analytics
description: We help you stay ahead of cloud, data, and network security challenges.Cloud transformation and work from anywhere have changed how security needs to work. Inventive sees and understands these changes and works with you to protect people and data anywhere they go, no matter what.
